reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: it's really nice hotel with a very good price, near to the walk and the beach. high tech. there's a bar with 4 violin players which's really nice and I highly recommend it for those who love classic music. one thing that I was disappointed with and it's not to the standard of the place is the receptionist at the massage center, she wasn't enthusiastic to work. another thing there was no basket of fruit in the room nor a bath robe. other than that it's a nice hotel with great location.
reviews.title: good location, high quality

reviews.text: This hotel is very nice as it is new. Some of the bars it advertised in it weren't open bu the English pub was great. The staff seem to be a bit disorganised and it took 40 minutes to get a continental breakfast as room service.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.text: Breakfast buffet is excellent with a chef cooking eggs for you while you wait.

reviews.text: On the whole, I found this hotel pretty good for the price I paid. (Best price is to log on to their site)

reviews.title: Awesome New Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent a week here in February and enjoyed every minute. The hotel is located in the Marina district of Dubai and is a perfect location for the beach, restaurants, yacht club and Dubai Metro (easy to use to get to other main parts of the city including the airport). Non-smoking room was comfortable and clean, looked on to Marina and yachts. Roof top pool good, in the shade mid afternoon but not really a problem. On site restaurants and bar fine, although found breakfast a little expensive for what we had, probably better to go to one of the local eateries near the beach. Found a greet little supermarket (Amalyos I think), just around the corner to the right of the entrance, open 24 hours, serves great vegetable samosas! All in all a great little find.
reviews.title: Great location in Marina district of Dubai

reviews.text: Very good hotel quality 4 stars as 5.
reviews.title: Cosy

reviews.text: Strategic location. Welcoming staff; and cleanness.
reviews.title: i like it and i'll give it 4
